desc: Please enter account email, we'll send you a link to reset your password.
sent_link: Password reset link has been sent to your registered email.
password_rule: Must be 8-12 characters long and contain at least one number and one symbol.
password_rule_error: Your password does not meet the requirements.
invalid_user: User not found. Please check your email.
invalid_key: Invalid Key. Please visit the forgot password page again to have a new key generated.
failed_update: Unable to reset password due to an unknown error.
